price: (Rasûlüm!) Kitap'ta Musa'yı da an. Gerçekten o ihlâs sahibi idi ve hem rasûl, hem de nebî idi.
arabic: وَٱذۡكُرۡ فِي ٱلۡكِتَٰبِ مُوسَىٰٓۚ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ مُخۡلَصٗا وَكَانَ رَسُولٗا نَّبِيّٗا

version.title: Turkish Translation - Ali Ozek
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Turkish by a group of scholars. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wa-udh'kur fī al-kitābi mūsā innahu kāna mukh'laṣan wakāna rasūlan nabiyyan
